channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortra -- Robot Schedule Enterprise Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortra -- Robot Schedule Enterprise Agent

item.title: CVE-2024-0259|2024-06-06T20:50:22.111Z -- fortra -- robot%20schedule%20enterprise%20agent
item.description: Fortra's Robot Schedule Enterprise Agent for Windows prior to version 3.04 is susceptible to privilege escalation. A low-privileged user can overwrite the service executable. When the service is restarted, the replaced binary runs with local system privileges, allowing a low-privileged user to gain elevated privileges.
